titleStmt.title: Description of Genesis with Targum Onḳelos and Sa'adia Gaon's Arabic translation in Hebrew characters, with superlinear punctuation.

availability.licence: This metadata, accompanying images, and the content of London, British Library, Oriental Manuscripts Or 2703: Genesis with Targum Onḳelos and Sa'adia Gaon's Arabic translation in Hebrew characters, with superlinear punctuation. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. See the Creative Commons Zero 1.0 Universal page for usage details, https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/.

notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Genesis with Targum Onḳelos and Sa'adia Gaon's Arabic translation in Hebrew characters, with superlinear punctuation.

collation.p: Hard to establish since many folios/quires are missing. Extant quires are mostly of 6 leaves.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Square Yemenite handwriting; folio 73r-73v is probably later than than the whole manuscript.

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), an antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Museum from him on 12 January 1884: inscribed on folio [77v].
